title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Enhancing Collective Judgment for Sustainable Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will implement group decision-making processes that reduce conformity pressure by over 30% using the INFO technique
Learners will improve quantitative estimation accuracy for real environmental issues (e.g., transportation planning) by over 25% through transdisciplinary case studies (TCS)
Learners will design and present integrated communication strategies that incorporate multidimensional approaches (environmental-economic-social) for sustainability challenges
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
